meanings.definition: A type of bus service that provides transportation to and from airports.
meanings.sent1: The aircoach arrived at the airport right on time.
meanings.sent2: I always take the aircoach when I travel to the airport.
meanings.sent3: The aircoach driver told a joke to make the passengers smile.
meanings.sent4: The aircoach is like a reliable friend, always there when you need it.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue aircoach stood out among the other vehicles at the airport.

meanings.definition: A company that operates buses for transporting passengers to and from airports.
meanings.sent1: My friend works for an aircoach company that has a fleet of buses.
meanings.sent2: The aircoach is a popular choice for airport transportation.
meanings.sent3: The aircoach company hosted a fun event for its employees.
meanings.sent4: The aircoach company is the backbone of airport transportation.
meanings.sent5: The logo of the aircoach company is easily recognizable at the airport.
